Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Emit a message into a specific environment. Optionally, wait a specific amount of time before emitting by specifying the amount of seconds before the woename of the environment."

"+emitin \\"Game:rooms:pub You hear gunshots from outside.\\"\\r\\n Emit a message immediately into \\\r\\n\\r\\n+emitin \\"5 Game:rooms:pub You hear gunshots from outside.\\"\\r\\n Wait 5 seconds before emitting."
